verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> by the <S%G2003>commandment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G4990>Savior,<s%> and <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is our <S%G1680>hope;<s%>

To <S%G5095>Timothy,<s%> my <S%G1103>own<s%> <S%G5043>son<s%> in the <S%G4102>faith:<s%> <S%G5485>Grace,<s%> <S%G1656>mercy,<s%> and <S%G1515>peace,<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G3962>Father<s%> and <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

As I <S%G3870>sought<s%> you to <S%G4357>abide<s%> <S%G4357>still<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus,<s%> when I <S%G4198>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia,<s%> that you might <S%G3853>charge<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> that they <S%G2085>teach<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G2085>other<s%> doctrine,

<S%G3366>Neither<s%> give <S%G4337>heed<s%> to <S%G3454>fables<s%> and <S%G562>endless<s%> <S%G1076>genealogies,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G3930>minister<s%> <S%G2214>questions,<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G2316>godly<s%> <S%G3618>edifying<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is in <S%G4102>faith:<s%> so do.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G5056>end<s%> of the <S%G3852>commandment<s%> is <S%G26>charity<s%> out of a <S%G2513>pure<s%> <S%G2588>heart,<s%> and of a <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G4893>conscience,<s%> and of <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G505>unfeigned:<s%>
From <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> having <S%G795>swerved<s%> have <S%G1624>turned<s%> <S%G1624>aside<s%> to <S%G3150>vain<s%> <S%G3150>jangling;<s%>

<S%G2309>Desiring<s%> to be <S%G3547>teachers<s%> of the <S%G3547>law;<s%> <S%G4920>understanding<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> they <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G4012>whereof<s%> <S%G5101><s%> they <S%G1226>affirm.<s%>
But we <S%G1492>know<s%> that the <S%G3551>law<s%> is <S%G2570>good,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G5530>use<s%> it <S%G3545>lawfully;<s%>

<S%G1492>Knowing<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> that the <S%G3551>law<s%> is not <S%G2749>made<s%> for a <S%G1342>righteous<s%> man, but for the <S%G459>lawless<s%> and <S%G506>disobedient,<s%> for the <S%G765>ungodly<s%> and for <S%G268>sinners,<s%> for <S%G462>unholy<s%> and <S%G952>profane,<s%> for <S%G3964>murderers<s%> of <S%G3964>fathers<s%> and <S%G3389>murderers<s%> of <S%G3389>mothers,<s%> for <S%G409>murderers,<s%>

For <S%G4205>fornicators,<s%> for them that <S%G733>defile<s%> themselves with <S%G733>mankind,<s%> for <S%G405>enslavers,<s%> for <S%G5583>liars,<s%> for <S%G1965>perjured<s%> <S%G678>persons,<s%> and <S%G1487>if<s%> there be <S%G1536>any<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> thing that is <S%G480>contrary<s%> to <S%G5198>sound<s%> <S%G1319>doctrine;<s%>
<S%G2596>According<s%> to the <S%G1391>glorious<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of the <S%G3107>blessed<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> was <S%G4100>committed<s%> to my <S%G4100>trust.<s%>

And I <S%G2192>thank<s%> <S%G5485><s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> has <S%G1743>enabled<s%> me, for that he <S%G2233>counted<s%> me <S%G4103>faithful,<s%> <S%G5087>putting<s%> me <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1248>ministry;<s%>

<S%G3588>Who<s%> was <S%G4386>before<s%> a <S%G989>blasphemer,<s%> and a <S%G1376>persecutor,<s%> and <S%G5197>injurious:<s%> but I <S%G1653>obtained<s%> <S%G1653>mercy,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> I did it <S%G50>ignorantly<s%> in <S%G570>unbelief.<s%>

And the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> was <S%G5250>exceeding<s%> <S%G5250>abundant<s%> with <S%G4102>faith<s%> and <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G3588>This<s%> is a <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G3056>saying,<s%> and <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G594>acceptation,<s%> that <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G268>sinners;<s%> of <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G4413>chief.<s%>

<S%G235>However,<s%> for <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1223>cause<s%> I <S%G1653>obtained<s%> <S%G1653>mercy,<s%> that in me <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> might <S%G1731>show<s%> <S%G1731>forth<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3115>long-suffering,<s%> for a <S%G5296>pattern<s%> to them which <S%G3195>should<s%> <S%G3195>hereafter<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> him to <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G166>everlasting.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> to the <S%G935>King<s%> <S%G165>eternal,<s%> <S%G862>immortal,<s%> <S%G517>invisible,<s%> the <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G4680>wise<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> be <S%G5092>honor<s%> and <S%G1391>glory<s%> for <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

<S%G5026>This<s%> <S%G3852>charge<s%> I <S%G3908>commit<s%> to you, <S%G5043>son<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4394>prophecies<s%> which <S%G4254>went<s%> <S%G4254>before<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> you, that you by them might <S%G4754>war<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4752>warfare;<s%>

<S%G2192>Holding<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> and a <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G4893>conscience;<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> having <S%G683>put<s%> <S%G683>away<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> have <S%G3489>made<s%> <S%G3489>shipwreck:<s%>

Of <S%G3739>whom<s%> is <S%G5211>Hymenaeus<s%> and <S%G223>Alexander;<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I have <S%G3860>delivered<s%> to <S%G4567>Satan,<s%> that they may <S%G3811>learn<s%> not to <S%G987>blaspheme.<s%>
